name: UniswapPoolKit
description: This KIT allows trader to invest with one side asset directly on Uniswap and as well sell at once their Uniswap pool token

name: SushiPoolKit
description: This KIT allows trader to invest with one side asset directly on Sushi and as well sell at once their Uniswap pool token

name: AaveConvertKit
description: This KIT allows trader to swap and convert directly asset to Aave collateral or withdraw Aave collateral and swap to other asset
